file.title: Columns

p.text: Using this property you can specify columns quantity and their headers. The columns are specified in the form of: "Column1", "Column2", where Column1 is a header of the first column, Column2 - of the second column.

remarks.text:
Quotes in the record "Column1", "Column2" are obligatory. If you want to change columns right in the process of your program work, then the action should look like this:
Window1.Table1.Columns = """Column1"", ""Column2""" As two double quotes ("") inside of the text are turned into one double (") we'll get eventually: "Column1", "Column2"
